columns.name: id
columns.description: The random ID string that Amazon Web Service generates as part of the link ARN.

columns.name: sink_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the sink that this link is attached to.

columns.name: label
columns.description: The label that was assigned to this link at creation, with the variables resolved to their actual values.

columns.name: label_template
columns.description: The exact label template that was specified when the link was created, with the template variables not resolved.

columns.name: resource_types
columns.description: The resource types supported by this link.
